item.title: SAME: Learning Generic Language-Guided Visual Navigation with State-Adaptive Mixture of Experts
item.description: State-Adaptive Mixture of Experts (SAME) model excels in generic language-guided visual navigation by consolidating diverse tasks and dynamically adapting to varying instruction granularities.
